processingResourceMetaData.name: lines from file collection reader
processingResourceMetaData.description: This collection reader facilitates reading documents from a directory.

configurationParameter.name: InputDirectory
configurationParameter.description: specifies the path of the directory containing input files.

configurationParameter.name: Language
configurationParameter.description: ISO language code for the documents

configurationParameter.name: Encoding
configurationParameter.description: Character encoding for the documents. If not specified, the default system encoding will be used. Note that this parameter only applies if there is no CAS Initializer provided; otherwise, it is the CAS Inializer's responsibility to deal with character encoding issues.

configurationParameter.name: Extensions
configurationParameter.description: specifies the extensions of the files that the collection reader will read. Values for this parameter should not begin with a dot ('.').

configurationParameter.name: Recurse
configurationParameter.description: If true, then the collection reader will recurse into subdirectories of the input directory.
